Detailed Description

cvmx_usbdrd::_uahc_dgcmd

This register enables software to program the core using a single generic command interface to send link management packets and notifications. This register contains command, control, and status fields relevant to the current generic command, while the USBDRD()_UAHC_DGCMDPAR register provides the command parameter.

This register can be reset by IOI reset or USBDRD()_UCTL_CTL[UAHC_RST] or USBDRD()_UAHC_GCTL[CORESOFTRESET] or USBDRD()_UAHC_USBCMD[HCRST] or USBDRD()_UAHC_USBCMD[LHCRST] or USBDRD()_UAHC_DCTL[CSFTRST].
